verses.name: Deuteronomy 34:10
verses.text: And there arose not a prophet since in Israel like unto Moses, whom the Lord knew face to face,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 34:11
verses.text: In all the signs and the wonders, which the Lord sent him to do in the land of Egypt to Pharaoh, and to all his servants, and to all his land,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 34:12
verses.text: And in all that mighty hand, and in all the great terror which Moses shewed in the sight of all Israel.
